data.lyric:
[ti:It's You]
[ar:Ali Gatie]
[al:It's You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It's You - Ali Gatie
[00:05.20]Lyrics by：Adrian Allahverdi/Ali Gatie/Andrew Wansel/Nathan Perez/Samuel Wishkoski
[00:10.40]It's you it's always you
[00:15.08]If I'm ever gonna fall in love I know it's gon' be you
[00:20.26]It's you it's always you
[00:25.67]Met a lot of people but nobody feels like you
[00:30.27]So please don't break my heart don't tear me apart
[00:35.82]I know how it starts trust me I've been broken before
[00:40.89]Don't break me again I am delicate
[00:45.80]Please don't break my heart
[00:48.05]Trust me I've been broken before
[00:51.01]I've been broken yeah I know how it feels
[00:55.79]To be open and then find out your love isn't real
[01:00.84]I'm still hurting yeah I'm hurting inside
[01:05.78]I'm so scared to fall in love but if it's you then I'll try
[01:10.29]It's you it's always you
[01:15.05]If I'm ever gonna fall in love I know it's gon' be you
[01:20.31]It's you it's always you
[01:25.63]Met a lot of people but nobody feels like you
[01:30.28]So please don't break my heart don't tear me apart
[01:35.80]I know how it starts trust me I've been broken before
[01:40.85]Don't break me again I am delicate
[01:45.84]Please don't break my heart
[01:48.07]Trust me I've been broken before
[01:50.48]I know I'm not the best at choosing lovers
[01:54.41]Oh
[01:55.63]We both know my past speaks for itself
[01:58.91]For itself
[02:00.36]If you don't think that we're right for each other
[02:04.50]Baby no
[02:05.37]Then please don't let history repeat itself
[02:09.94]'Cause I want you yeah I want you yeah
[02:15.30]There's nothing else I want
[02:19.89]'Cause I want you yeah I want you yeah
[02:25.24]And you're the only thing I want
[02:30.52]It's you it's always you
[02:35.03]If I'm ever gonna fall in love I know it's gon' be you
[02:40.30]It's you it's always you
[02:45.60]Met a lot of people but nobody feels like you
[02:50.33]So please don't break my heart don't tear me apart
[02:55.80]I know how it starts trust me I've been broken before
[03:00.76]Don't break me again I am delicate
[03:05.78]Please don't break my heart
[03:08.05]Trust me I've been broken before
[03:10.87]Baby I want you baby I want you
[03:13.32]Baby I want you baby I want you
[03:15.81]Baby I want you baby I want you
[03:18.62]You you 'cause I want you
[03:20.81]Baby I want you baby I want you
[03:23.33]Baby I want you baby I want you
[03:25.82]Baby I want you baby I want you
[03:28.61]You you
data.trans:
[ti:It's You]
[ar:Ali Gatie]
[al:It's You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.20]//
[00:10.40]是你 一直都是你
[00:15.08]若我陷入爱河 我知道那个人肯定是你
[00:20.26]是你 一直都是你
[00:25.67]曾遇见无数的人 但没有一个像你
[00:30.27]所以别伤我的心 别让我撕心裂肺
[00:35.82]我知道这一切是怎样开始的 相信我 我曾被深深伤害
[00:40.89]别再让我心碎一次 我很脆弱
[00:45.80]请别伤我的心
[00:48.05]相信我 我曾被深深伤害
[00:51.01]我曾被深深伤害 我知道那是什么感觉
[00:55.79]我敞开心扉 却发现你的爱不过是敷衍
[01:00.84]我仍隐隐作痛 内心深处鲜血淋漓
[01:05.78]我害怕陷入爱情 但若是你 我愿意一试
[01:10.29]是你 一直都是你
[01:15.05]若我陷入爱河 我知道那个人肯定是你
[01:20.31]是你 一直都是你
[01:25.63]曾遇见无数的人 但没有一个像你
[01:30.28]所以别伤我的心 别让我撕心裂肺
[01:35.80]我知道这一切是怎样开始的 相信我 我曾被深深伤害
[01:40.85]别再让我心碎一次 我很脆弱
[01:45.84]请别伤我的心
[01:48.07]相信我 我曾被深深伤害
[01:50.48]我知道我并不擅长寻觅爱人
[01:54.41]//
[01:55.63]我们都清楚我的过去 我是什么人显而易见
[01:58.91]显而易见
[02:00.36]若你觉得我们彼此不适合
[02:04.50]宝贝 不要
[02:05.37]那就不要重蹈覆辙
[02:09.94]因为我想要你 我想要你
[02:15.30]别无他求
[02:19.89]因为我想要你 我想要你
[02:25.24]你是我的唯一渴求
[02:30.52]是你 一直都是你
[02:35.03]若我陷入爱河 我知道那个人肯定是你
[02:40.30]是你 一直都是你
[02:45.60]曾遇见无数的人 但没有一个像你
[02:50.33]所以别伤我的心 别让我撕心裂肺
[02:55.80]我知道这一切是怎样开始的 相信我 我曾被深深伤害
[03:00.76]别再让我心碎一次 我很脆弱
[03:05.78]请别伤我的心
[03:08.05]相信我 我曾被深深伤害
[03:10.87]宝贝 我想要你 宝贝 我想要你
[03:13.32]宝贝 我想要你 宝贝 我想要你
[03:15.81]宝贝 我想要你 宝贝 我想要你
[03:18.62]你 你 因为我渴望你
[03:20.81]宝贝 我想要你 宝贝 我想要你
[03:23.33]宝贝 我想要你 宝贝 我想要你
[03:25.82]宝贝 我想要你 宝贝 我想要你
[03:28.61]你 你
